name: Dramatique - Best Actor
description: BEST ACTOR, the platform where you can be the spotlight by showcasing your passion.
regulations: BEST ACTOR, the platform where you can be the spotlight by showcasing your passion.
nil
Preliminary Round :  Movie Scene Reenactment
Each participant must prepare a 5-minute-long movie scene in advance.
The audio clip of the selected scene will be played, and the participant must act it out accordingly.
Lip-syncing, expressions, body language, and overall performance will be judged.
Intermediate Round:  Property Round
Each participant will be provided with a random prop.
The participant must incorporate the given prop into their performance creatively.
The duration of the act is 2 minutes.
Judging will be based on creativity, expression, and effective use of the property.
Final Round : Improvisation Round
Each participant will be given a situation on the spot.
They must enact the given scenario creatively and convincingly.
The time limit for this round will be 2 minutes.

name: Retro Revival
description: Retro Revival is an exciting competition that challenges participants to recreate iconic movie scenes through acting and cinematography. Contestants must capture the essence of the original scene and this event tests participants' attention to detail and cinematic creativity.
regulations: 1.There will be screening before the final round
2. The shortlisted participants will enter the final round which will be conducted in the main stage.
3. Performances must adhere to specified time limits
(Max.: 5minutes, Min:2 minutes)
4.Maximum no of teammates is 8
5.Violation of any rules may result in disqualification

name: Tango Doble
description: The Duo Dance Competition is an exciting three-level event where pairs compete to showcase their synchronization, creativity, and technique.
regulations: 1-The competition consists of three rounds:
1st Round: Online selection.
2nd Round: On-stage performance with prepared choreography.
3rd Round: Spot choreography round.
2-Contestants must submit a 2-minute video of their planned stage performance for the online selection round.
3-Performance time limit: Maximum 5 minutes. Participants must complete their performance within this time.
4-Participants must arrange their own costumes and audio.
5-Each team can have a maximum of 2 members.
6-Duo can consist of any gender combination:
A boy and a girl
Two girls
Two boys
7-No substitutes will be allowed once the competition starts.
8- Props and lifts must be used safely. Props should not damage the stage or cause inconvenience to other contestants.
9-Contestants are free to choose any dance style, including hip-hop, freestyle, classical, etc.
10-Selected contestants cannot back out at the last minute.
‚ö†Ô∏è The judges' decision will be final
Rules for Round 3 (Spot Choreography Round)
The top 3 teams from Round 2 will advance to Round 3.
1-Each team will be given a random song and 3 minutes to create a choreography.
2-No extra time will be provided for preparation.
3-The song assigned cannot be changed.

name: Canvas Carnival
description: Join us for an exciting Drawing Competition, where your artistic skills will take center stage! Whether you're a seasoned artist or just love to sketch, this is your chance to showcase your talent.
regulations: 1.All participants must undergo a screening process (if  the number of participants will be more than 15) and  followed by preliminary rounds before advancing to the finals.
2.Shortlisted participants will compete in the final round, which will take place on the main stage.
3.Contestants will be assessed based on their skill, intelligence, personality, and creativity through various rounds.
4.The ultimate evaluation of the judges will be final.

name: Celista Star
description: Get ready for an electrifying day packed with non-stop entertainment, thrilling moments, and endless excitement! Dare to dream big, reach for the stars, and make unforgettable memories along the way!
regulations: 1.All participants must undergo a screening process (if  the number of participants will be more than 15) and  followed by preliminary rounds before advancing to the finals.
2.Shortlisted participants will compete in the final round, which will take place on the main stage.
3.Contestants will be assessed based on their skill, intelligence, personality, and creativity through various rounds.
4.The ultimate evaluation of the judges will be final.

name: Mehandi Competition
description: Mehandi competition is an event where participants showcase their skills in creating intricate henna designs on hands or feet. The competition focuses on factors like design complexity, creativity, symmetry, and the richness of the henna stain.
regulations: Maximum 20 participants
Theme: Bridal Mehandi Designs
Mehandi cones will be provided
Participants must bring a person for design application

name: Best Singer
description: Music is an emotion which reveals the identity of a soulüí´. The mesmerizing power of it, takes one to the galaxy of feelings‚ú®üé∂. The hunt for the best singer of Pratitya 2025 starts upüéß.

name: Best Choreo

Teams interested in joining can register using this google form.  Prelims/Screening will be conducted following the registration deadline**.

üìåMinimum no of participants- 8

name: Maestro Mind ‚Äì Best Manager
description: The Best Manager Competition is the ultimate test of leadership, strategic thinking, and crisis management. Designed to push participants to their limits, this multi-round event simulates real-world business challenges where individuals must showcase their decision making skills, problem-solving abilities, and resilience under pressure.
regulations: 1.Best Manager is an individual event
2. Each round has a specific time limit
3. Rules and details of specific rounds shall be disclosed on spot
4. Decision of the judges and event coordinators will be final
5. All participants must abide by college and event regulations

name: Face Painting Competition
description: Join us for an exciting Face Painting Competition! Ten participants will have the chance to showcase their creativity and talent. The theme for the competition will be provided on the day of the event, and all necessary materials will be supplied.
regulations: The theme will be provided on the spot.
Participants will have five minutes for preparation before the competition begins
Mobile phones will be confiscated after the five-minute preparation period and will be returned after the competition.

name: Tale Weavers
description: Event Story Writing is a form of storytelling that captures the essence of an event in a structured and engaging way. It combines elements of journalism, narrative writing, and creative storytelling to describe what happened, who was involved, and the impact of the event.
regulations: 1.The competition consists of one round the topic of the story writing will be given at that time.
2. Duration : 1 and half hour
3. Medium of language:English.

name: Memory Fiesta
description: Reliving the best moments of college life in a 1 minute video.
regulations: Video duration: 1 minute
Submit before 24/2/25

name: Mystic Quest - Treasure Hunt
description: Are you ready to embark on a thrilling adventure across the campus? Solve riddles, complete challenges, and race against time to uncover hidden clues leading to the ultimate treasure! Gather your team, put on your thinking caps, and let the hunt begin!
regulations: Event Rules & Guidelines:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Team Size: Maximum 7 teams (first come, first serve basis), each team consisting of 4 members.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Clue-Based Challenge: Each clue will lead to a new location, but you must complete a task at every clue point before moving to the next.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Time Limit: Teams must finish the hunt within the allotted time to be eligible for winning.
4Ô∏è‚É£ No External Help: Use of mobile phones or outside assistance is strictly prohibited.
5Ô∏è‚É£ Fair Play: Teams found interfering with others‚Äô clues or sabotaging will be disqualified.
6Ô∏è‚É£ Winning Criteria: The team that successfully finds the final treasure in the shortest time wins.

name: Play Station
regulations: This fifa tournament consits of 5 rounds and contains 32 teams. Every match has tie breakers

Round of 32 - 5 mins

quarter-finals - 10 mins

name: MALAYALI MANKA AND KERALA SREEMAN
description: The "Malayali Manka and Kerala Sreeman" competition celebrates the cultural beauty, wit, and charm of individuals from Kerala, with participants showcasing their traditional and modern talents.
regulations: Competition will be held in two rounds: PRELIMS and FINALS
Female contestants must wear traditional Kerala Settu Saree/Settu Mundu/Pattu Pavada
Male contestants must wear Mundu (off white colour) and Shirt/Kurta
Time duration for each round will be informed at venue
Winners will be awarded cash prizes and certificates
Judges' decisions are final
